traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The harengon's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit (the target gains no benefit from less than total cover), range 320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage. Hit or Miss: Immediately after making this attack, the harengon can use the Hide action.
